name: Lucky Saint Alcohol Free Lemon Lager Cans 4x330ml

name: Lucky Saint Alcohol Free Lager 4x330ml
description: HighlightsAlcohol Free70 kJ / 16 kcal / 100mlSuitable for VegansDescriptionAlcohol Free BeerLucky Saint is born of Pilsner malt, noble hops, spring water and our classic lager yeast. name: Heineken 0.0% Alcohol Free Lager Beer Can 6x330ml
description: Highlights0.0 Alcohol Free69 Calories Per CanAlcohol Free Beer with Natural FlavouringsDescriptionAlcohol Free Beer with Natural FlavouringsFor more information visit: HEINEKEN.COMBrewing a great tasting alcohol free beer, is it even possible? Our master brewers started from zero and spent years exploring, brewing and tasting before they finally created a recipe defined by its refreshing fruity notes and soft malty body - perfectly balanced with only 69 calories.Heineken 0.0 is a refreshing alcohol free beer characterised by fruity and fresh malt notes and a lightbody. At just 69 calories this is a great refreshing drink for all.Contains 24 x 330ml bottles.Taste best served chilled.We've cut our emissions when making our beers and ciders by 68% since 2008Brewed with the uncompromising Heineken characteristics since 1873. And made with natural ingredients including Heineken's unique A-Yeast. It wasn't easy, but not impossible.Heineken® 0.0 has the seal of approval from the Heineken family - a rare honour as there are very few Heineken® variants.The non-alcoholic version of the flagship lager contains just 69 calories.Rather than remove the alcohol from Heineken® our master brewer, Willem van Waesberge, brewed the beer from scratch to deliver the best tasting zero alcohol beer.Pack size: 1980MLIngredientsWater, Malted Barley, Hop Extract, Natural FlavouringsAllergy InformationContains: BarleyAlcohol TypeBeerNet Contents6 x 330ml ℮Preparation and UsageServe coldLower age limit18 Years

name: Peroni Nastro Azzurro 0% Alcohol Free Beer Bottles 12x330ml
description: DescriptionBeerBrewed in Italy to the original recipe since 1963; Peroni Nastro Azzurro 0.0% Italian beer delivers a crisp and refreshing taste with light citrus notes without the alcohol.Our exclusively grown Nostrano dell’Isola maize gives Peroni Nastro Azzurro 0.0% its uplifting and unique taste, with a fast clean finish.Peroni Nastro Azzurro can be enjoyed at all occasions and social moments where beer lovers are seeking a refreshing tasting alcohol free Italian beer. Whether you're meeting friends at a bar, exploring sun-soaked streets on holiday, watching an afternoon of sport – there are no limits to when, and where, you can feel the invigoration of authentic Italian craftmanship, passion and flair with this pack of 12 330ml Peroni Nastro Azzurro 0.0% bottles.Best served chilled.Taste Profile: Crisp taste with a slightly hoppy, subtle citrus aromatic notes. Light body with a clean and fast finish.Pack size: 12 x 330ml bottles.ABV: 0.0%Ingredients: Water, barley malt, Italian maize, hops, natural flavoursBe DrinkAware at www.drinkaware.co.ukPeroni Nastro Azzurro 0.0% aims to serve occasions and social moments where beer lovers are seeking a superior tasting alcohol free beer.Whether you’re at home hosting dinner parties al fresco, watching an afternoon of sport, meeting friends at a bar, exploring sun-soaked streets on holiday - there are no limits to when, and where, you can enjoy Peroni Nastro Azzurro 0.0% Alcohol Free Beer.Pack size: 3960MLIngredientsWater, Barely Malt, Italian Maize, Hops, Natural FlavoursAllergy InformationContains BarleyAlcohol TypeBeerProduce ofBrewed and bottled in ItalyCountryItalyNet Contents12 x 330ml ℮Lower age limit18 Years

name: Gordon's Alcohol Free Premium Pink Spirit 70Cl
description: HighlightsABOUT – Gordon's Premium Pink 0.0% Alcohol Free Gin offers the same delicious taste of Gordon's Premium Pink Gin but without the alcohol. Infused with the sweetness of ripe raspberries and strawberries, this non alcoholic alternative to gin is perfect for those looking for the taste of gin with none of the alcoholALCOHOL FREE – Enjoy January with Gordon's Premium Pink 0.0%: an alcohol free delight that brings all the flavour and flair, enhancing any occasion with easeTASTING NOTES – Gordon's Premium Pink 0.0% Alcohol Free Gin's tasting notes include the sweetness of raspberries and strawberries, and the tang of redcurrants and juniperHOW TO ENJOY – Gordon's Premium Pink 0.0% Alcohol Free Gin is best served with tonic water and lots of ice for a delicious alcohol free G&T with a fruity twist, or as the base of a gin mocktailAWARDS – Gordon's Gin has been awarded four Royal Warrants and an impressive selection of international gin awardsPERFECT FOR GIFTING – Gordon's Premium Pink 0.0% is the perfect non alcoholic gift for those who are moderating and looking for a fantastic alternative to alcohol, or who want to serve a delicious mocktail to guests when hostingDescriptionGordon's Premium Pink 0.0% Alcohol Free Gin is a delicious and sophisticated non-alcoholic alternative for those who appreciate the classic taste of Gordon's Premium Pink Gin but don't want to drink alcohol. name: Tanqueray Alcohol Free 0% Spirit 70Cl
description: HighlightsABOUT – Tanqueray Alcohol Free 0.0% is a non alcoholic spirit made from four botanicals, which are perfectly balanced to give a complex and refreshing taste with the juniper and citrus style that Tanqueray is famous forALCOHOL FREE – Enjoy this full-flavoured alcohol free alternative while maintaining the Tanqueray tasteTASTING NOTES – Tanqueray Alcohol Free 0.0%’s tasting notes feature the iconic botanicals found in Tanqueray gin, including juniper and citrusHOW TO ENJOY – Tanqueray Alcohol Free 0.0% is best served with a premium tonic water, ice and a citrus garnish for a non-alcoholic G&T. It can also be enjoyed as the base of classic gin cocktails for an alcohol-free optionGIFTING – Tanqueray Alcohol Free 0.0% is the perfect gift for gin lovers looking for a non alcoholic alternative to their favourite Tanqueray ginOCCASION – Enjoy the taste you love anytime with Tanqueray Alcohol Free 0.0% spirit. Savour the classics, without the alcoholDescriptionTanqueray Alcohol Free 0.0% has a citrus style and juniper led profile, with a delicate botanical complexity behind it. Just like your usual Tanqueray and tonic, serve with your chosen tonic and garnish over ice, then sip, savour and appreciate! Or you could also try it out in your favourite non alcoholic cocktail Tanqueray's distinct blend of four quality botanicals are individually immersed in water, heated and then distilled to give a complex and refreshing taste with the juniper and citrus style that Tanqueray is famous for. Tanqueray 0.0% allows you to discover the definitive experience from Tanqueray, just without the alcohol.Tanqueray – distilling excellence since 1830.Tanqueray London Dry Gin was created by brand founder Charles Tanqueray in 1830 and it is still made to the same classic, timeless recipe today. Its iconic bottle shape is inspired by a three-part cocktail shaker made famous during Prohibition in the “Roaring 1920s”. The pineapple fruit was the ultimate symbol of hospitality in 1830s England and features in the Tanqueray family crest which adorns every bottle from the Tanqueray Distilling Company.Pack size: 70CLAlcohol TypeSpiritsCountryItalyNet Contents0.7lLower age limit18 Years
